text: Sylvia Bretschneider (14 November 1960 – 28 April 2019) was a German politician. She was a member of the Social Democratic Party (SPD). She became a member of the Landtag (regional parliament) of Mecklenburg-Vorpommern in 1994. She became speaker of the state's assembly in 2002. She died in office in 2019. She was born in Waren (Müritz), Mecklenburg-Vorpommern. She was married and had three children. Bretschneider died of cancer in Neubrandenburg on 28 April 2019. She was 58. ==References== Category:1960 births Category:2019 deaths Category:Cancer deaths in Germany Category:Politicians from Mecklenburg-Vorpommern Category:Politicians of the Social Democratic Party of Germany
title: Sylvia Bretschneider
